message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to be selling this product which I believe would be a great asset to you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but $20,000 is out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, $12,000 is significantly below the market value of this product. I could consider $17,000. This reflects the true value and the benefits it will bring to your business.
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not comfortable with $17,000. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for it. Can you consider this price?
